thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1703
thread.title: Donna Berridge

author: Donna Berridge
title: Donna Berridge
text:
I just booked two tickets in a very fast and efficient way. I was totally impressed at how easy it was to do.
I would totally recommend everyone that I know to use FlightHub. I know of another family member that booked through someone else and did not get the great price that we got not even close to it. We are very happy and are looking forward to our trip.
